text: This is a list of programming broadcast on each feed of Colors Rishtey around the world. It mainly broadcasts reruns of Colors series while also airing new series and shows from other networks. == Indian feed == These are the programs broadcast on the Indian feed of Rishtey. This feed broadcasts only in the Indian subcontinent, which includes India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Bhutan, Maldives, and Nepal. === Drama === *Khatra Hai ! *Kitchen Ki Jung Celebrities Kay Sung *Yaariyan *Tere Naal Ishq *Laagi Tujhse Lagan *Shakti - Ek Mard or Kinnar Ki Prem Katha *Naagin *Pyaar Bana Kavach *Fannah Hon Sabhi Dooriyan **Sasural Simar ka'' === Animated === * Chhoti Anandi * Dora the Explorer * Gattu Battu * Go, Diego, Go! * Jungle Book * Keymon Ache * Motu Patlu * Pakdam Pakdai * Paw Patrol * Shiva *ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks === Former shows === * Aaradhya Ki Prem Katha * Isha ki Anokhi Daastan * Bahuraani Badi Sayaani * Bairi Piya * Kacchi Umar Ke Pakke Rishte * Bani – Ishq Di Meher * Bhagya * Bigg Boss * Chakravartin Ashoka Samrat * Ek Mayavi Prem Katha - Chandrakanta * Dil Ki Pukar * Dil Se Dil Tak * Ek Mahal Ho Armaanon Ka * Ek Shringaar-Swabhiman * Ek Vishkanya Ki Kahani * Don IPS * Hamari Saas Leela * Ishq Mein Marjawan * Jai Shri Krishna * Kaisi Yeh Yaariaan * Kasam Tere Pyaar Ki * Kavach Kaali Shaktiyon Se * Kitani Mohabbat Hai * Laagi Tujhse Lagan * Maat Pitaah Ke Charnon Mein Swarg * Madhubala – Ek Ishq Ek Junoon * Mere Dil Ki Lifeline * Meri Aashiqui Tum Se Hi * Mohe Rang Do Lal * Mrs. Pammi Pyarelal * Laado Veerpur Ki Mardani * Na Tum Bole Na Maine Bola * Naagin * Parichay'' * Phulwa * Luv Kush * Rangrasiya * Roop - Mard Ka Naya Swaroop * Salaam-E-Ishq * Bharadwaj Bhauein * Shakti * Karmaphal Daata Shani * Swaragini * Shastri Sisters * Tere Sang Yaara * Thapki Pyar Ki * Tu Aashiqui * Udaan - Sapnon Ki * Uttaran * Veer Shivaji * Yeh Pyar Na Hoga Kam == UK feed == These are all the series broadcast on Colors Rishey in Europe. This feed broadcasts only in the United Kingdom and Ireland. === Current Broadcast === *Vatsayla Tech *Bharadwaj Bahuein *Om Namah Shivaay *Jai Shri Krishna *Silsila Badalte Rishton Ka *The Rasoi Show Season 2 *Chhuta Chheda *Tum Kaun Piya *Dil Ka Rishta *Bigg Boss 14 *Barrister Babu *Balika Vadhu *Mere Humrahi *Zindagi Ki Haqeeqat Se Aamna Saamna *Desi Beat 2 *Khatra Khatra Khatra *Desi Beat 3.0 === Formerly Broadcast=== * Aasmanon Pay Likha * The Anupam Kher Show - Kucch Bhi Ho Sakta Hai * Bairi Piya * Bandhan Saat Janamon Ka * Bandini * Bani – Ishq Da Kalma * Beintehaa * Bhagyavidhaata * Bepannah * Comedy Nights Bachao * Comedy Nights with Kapil * Chhal — Sheh Aur Maat * Chakravartin Ashoka Samrat * Dil Ki Pukar * Bigg Boss Hindi * Bigg Boss Marathi * Jai Jag Janani Maa Durga * Halla Bol * Humsafar * India’s Got Talent * Internet Wala Love * Ishq Mein Marjawan * Jaahanara * Jeevan Saathi * Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa * Kaisi Yeh Yaariaan * Kasam Tere Pyaar Ki * Kitchen Champion * Kitani Mohabbat Hai * Koi Aane Ko Hai * Laado * Maat * Swarg * Meri Aashiqui Tum Se Hi * Mrs. Pammi Pyarelal * Na Bole Tum Na Maine Kuch Kaha * Naagin * Nail Polish * Parichay * Uttaran * Zindagi Ki Haqeeqat Se Aamna Saamna * Madhubala – Ek Ishq Ek Junoon * Radhaa Ki Betiyaan Kuch Kar Dikhayengi * Rangrasiya * Radha Prem Ki Deewani * Red Alert - Saachi Ghatnye * Shaitaan: A Criminal Mind * MTV Films: Tripping In Goa * Unplugged * Dance Deewane * Rising Star * Yeh Pyar Na Hoga Kam * BFF's with Vogue * Vogue BFF * Salaam-E-Ishq: Ek Daastan Mohabbat Ki * Main Teri Parchhain Hoon * Thapki Pyaar Ki * Warrior High * Mukti Bandan * Motu Patlu * Pakdam Pakdai * Mission Sapne * Pabband Ishq * Bhaag Bakool Bhaag * BIG F * The Great Indian Global Kitchen * Karmaphal Daata Shani * Strictly Street * Divine Destinations * Amruta Ghadge & Family * Tantra * Famously Filmfare * Navrangi Re! * Hum Saaf Saaf Hain * Daily Bonus * The Bollywood Roundtable 2019 * Style Chef * Jagte Raho * Colors Ke Sang Antakshri Ke Rang * Tere Sang Yara * Dev * Love School * Namastey Breakfast * Laagi Tujhse Lagan * Jeevan Saathi - Humsafar Zindagi Ke * Mera Naseeb * Ranjish Hi Sahi * Halla Bol * Dariba Diaries * Mere Qatil Mere Dildar * Jaltay Gulab * Mera Khoon Howa Tha * Yeh Piyar Hai * Meray Dil Meray Musafir * Veer Shivaji * Phulwa * Dev 2 * Yeh Hai Aashiqui *Desi Beat *Kitchen Champion *Khatron Ke Khiladi 10 *Troll Police *Mujhse Shaadi Karoge *Mahakali — Anth Hi Aarambh Hai *Shrimad Bhagwat Mahapuran *Swaragini *Tere Naal Ishq *BFFs With Vogue Season 2 *Feet Up With The Stars *Dharam Thi Gujarati == Asia feed == These are the series broadcast on the Asian feed on Rishtey. This feed is only broadcast in the Middle East, Myanmar, Australia, Taiwan, Indonesia, South Korea and Mauritius. === Current Broadcast === * The Great Indian Global Kitchen * Dil Ka Rishta * Mere Humrahi * Tum Kaun Piya * Khoob Ladi Mardaani - Jhansi Ki Rani * Khatra Khatra Khatra * Jagte Raho 2 *The Channels Also Airs Bollywood Movies Under the ‘Movie Mania - one break movie’ brand every night 9PM. == American feed == These are the series broadcast on the American feed of Colors Rishtey. This feed is only broadcast in United States and Canada. The channel revamped from Rishtey Americas to Colors Rishtey Americas with brand new shows on 15 August 2019. === Current Shows === * Bhaag Bakool Bhaag * Bharadwaj Bahuein * Chandrakanta * Dastaan-E-Mohabbat Salim Anarkali * Ek Shringaar-Swabhiman * Ek Vishkanya Ki Kahani * Fanha Ho Sabhi Dooriya * Internet Wala Love * Ishq Mein Marjawan * Jaahanara * Jhansi Ki Rani * Kasam Dobara * Kesari Nandan * Madhubala - Ek Ishq Ek Junoon * Meri Aashiqui Tumse Hi * Naagin (Seasons 1–3) * Radha Prem Ki Deewani * Rangrasiya * Red Alert - Saachi Ghatnye * Rudra: Boom Chik Chik Boom * Swaragini * Salaam-E-Ishq - Daastaan Mohabbat Ki * Tantra * The Great Indian Global Kitchen * Tu Aashiqui === Former Shows === *Balika Badhu *Bandini *Belan Wali Bahu *Chakravartin Ashoka Samrat *Hum Saaf Saaf Hain *Kavach — Kali Shaktiyon Se *Kitani Mohabbat Hai *Laagi Tujhse Lagan *Maat Pitaah Ke Charnon Mein Swarg *Mere Dil Ki Lifeline *Mohe Rang Do Laal *Mrs. Pammi Pyarelal *Na Aana Is Des Laado *Na Bole Tum Na Maine Kuch Kaha *Navrangi Re *Parichay *Radhaa Ki Betiyaan Kuch Kar Dikhayengi *Shani *Tere Sang Yaara *Udāān *Uttaran *Veer Shivaji == References == Category:Viacom 18 Category:Lists of Indian television series Category:Colors Rishtey original programming
title: List of programming broadcast by Colors Rishtey
